title: Matchsafe
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Figure of woman in dress with green skirt and white ruffled collar shirt with green and orange dots. Figure holds left hand up to chin and orange bag in right hand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe.
Porcelain. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-304.
